alert.note: Alert for Lower Yukon River (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 14 at 1:25PM AKST until November 16 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 PM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 7 to 10 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Lower Yukon River. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 3 PM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highest snowfall amounts from Marshall to St Marys north. Ice accumulations of a light glaze is possible.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning means significant amounts of snow, sleet and ice are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.
